entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
